mapper.sql: id, item_type,supervision_type_id, pid, stage_index, name, supervision_org_id, supervision_user_id, preparer_org_id, preparer_id, preparer_time,end_time,is_stept,status,super_item_type
mapper.select: select i.*,m.name AS sType,o.name as orgName,m1.name as itemCategory from t_item AS i LEFT JOIN t_org AS o ON o.id=i.`supervision_org_id` LEFT JOIN `t_meta` AS m ON m.`id`=i.`supervision_type_id` LEFT JOIN `t_meta` AS m1 ON m1.id=i.`super_item_type` WHERE i.`id`=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_item (id,item_type, supervision_type_id, pid, stage_index, name, supervision_org_id, supervision_user_id, preparer_org_id, preparer_id, preparer_time,end_time,is_stept,status,super_item_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superItemType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_item
supervision_type_id = #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_type = #{itemType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stage_index = #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervision_org_id = #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supervision_user_id = #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_org_id = #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_id = #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preparer_time = #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_stept = #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
super_item_type = #{superItemType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_item set supervision_type_id = #{supervisionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_type = #{itemType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stage_index = #{stageIndex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervision_org_id = #{supervisionOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supervision_user_id = #{supervisionUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_org_id = #{preparerOrgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_id = #{preparerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preparer_time = #{preparerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_stept = #{isStept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, super_item_type=#{superItemType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select name from t_item where name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and item_type=#{itemType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*)
